oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Q. Public Cab Stand, or Take Us to 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue, circa 1960
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original political cartoon created by Jack Knox, the Nashville Banner editorial cartoonist from the mid-1940s to the early 1970s. Based on an original metal plate, this printed reproduction shows John F. Kennedy and Bobby Kennedy heading a group at the "John C. Public Cab Stand" with the caption "Take us to 1600 Pennsylvania Ave." The entourage includes Chester Bowles, Walter Reuther, Adam Clayton Powell, Lyndon Johnson, Frank Sinatra and others. Forms part of the Jack Knox Political Cartoon Collection. 1 printed reproduction : b & w ; 12.5 x 14 in.
